name: Kost kamar type studio Apartemen
address: Gg. VIII No.23, Kerobokan Kaja, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: It was really nice place, with green lawn, quiet atmosphere and nice people living in, but neverending construction on premices with all following noises, dust and mess totally killed it. WiFi works well in closest to routers rooms only, electricity unit is pretty expensive, for 50000 you‚Äôll get 29 kWt only.
review 2: To get your bike on parking fully under water during wet season, get out of water and stand in foam in shower because of management forgot to pay for electricity, listen hammers and drills at 8 am of Sunday, have wifi router which is amplifying by cans from beverages instead of repeaters - these are pleasures of stay here
review 3: I live in this place and really like it. Clean apartment and they have also good cafe downstairs. Highly recommended.
review 4: nice residential..but a bit far from city

name: Wagyu Man Gunung Sanghyang
address: Jl. Gunung Sanghyang No.268, Kerobokan, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
So far, so good.
Affordable.
Note:
Please upgrade the knife.

The service is the best 100%

Recommended, you should try!
review 2:
For 200gr tenderloin, with option of fries/ wedges/ mash, sauces and drink, only cost 55k. The price is so affordable if you want to have steak without spending too much.
The taste might be scored 7/10. But... yeah, it is cheap!
review 3: Absolutely loved my experience at WAGYUMAN! The place is spotless, the food tastes amazing, and the menu has something for everyone. The staff were super friendly and made the whole dining experience even better. Definitely coming back for more! Highly recommend!
review 4:
All the foods are very mouthwatering. Rib-eye Steaks serve with hot plate, meats very soft‚ù§Ô∏è , we requested for Medium-Rare, the sauces are very delicious, I picked black pepper sauce and my friend picked mushrooms sauce. We also can choose what kind of potatoes we want.
But in some part, the hot plate too hot, so the veggies are over-burnt. The ice tea is too sweet for me. We also ordered truffle beef pasta, the taste similar with Aglio Olio but with additional truffle taste (free 1 drink if order this menu). End up we had 3 drinks üòÇü§≠
review 5:
The place was easy to find, next to Kantor Pos. I like the steak, rib eye cut with saut√© veggies. The vegetables are good, still crunchy but fine. The brown sauce isn't really recommended, the only taste is "rasa tepung" or the starch, which is not tasty at all. It takes around 30 minutes to get the food, a bit longer with only few visitors dining in. The price is fine, still affordable for a plate of steak. A steak (tenderloin/sirloin/rib eye) served with a condiment (fries/potato wedges/rice) and the sauce (they have 5 kinds) with a beverage (tea/still water) charge IDR 60k, including tax 10%. They have other food like spaghetti, fish and chips, the side dishes and beverages are various.
The seats are many, upstairs or downstairs seats. The place is comfy, nice, clean.
If you are a steak lover, or wanna try a steak for thr first time, come and have a visit!

name: OYO 3897 Fajar Guest House
address: Jl. Raya Kerobokan Gg. Wilis, Kerobokan, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80117, Indonesia
review 1: That hotel manager was nice and the room was comfortable. But when checking in the OYO company claimed me additional charge, which was resulting more than double I booked via Agoda.  Besides, when checking in the other OYO hotel in Kuta, it was overbooked and no room was available.  I'll never use OYO hotel any more.
review 2:
I booked 11 nights here but they only cleaned my room 1 time despite i kept reminding them.
Mould is everywhere from the wardrobe to the bed.
Lots of cockroaches too
review 3: Booked over Agoda and when I arrived got told all rooms are full. They wanted me to call the customer service to cancel the booking when it obviously wasn‚Äôt my mistake. After almost one hour waiting to find a solution I just left. Place looked nice but highly unprofessional.
review 4: The hotel cancelled my booking a few hours before check in. This is a terrible disrespect to their guests.  Plans for New Year's Eve were ruined.  I don't recommend this hotel to anyone.

name: Bakso Laros
address: 955G+39W, Jl. Muding Batu Sangian IV, Kerobokan Kaja, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: By far, this is the best bakso from a street vendor in Bali. You have to try their tahu walik, and also their pangsit goreng with that bakso of yours! Come there between 11am to 2pm max, or else they‚Äôll be running out of some of the favorite ones..
review 2: GILAKK!!! FINALLY!!!! The real Bakso Urat in Bali!!!!! Must try!!!!
review 3: It tastes good, the price is cheap, the waiter is friendly, the place is neat and clean, but unfortunately it doesn't open until late.
review 4:
The bakso in this place is good! A bit pricier than an ordinary bakso stall, but I think it's OK. Meatball is very tasty. A lot of people eat at this place.

The place is clean as well. And they have extra stuff like kerupuk or pangsit if you want. Price range is from 10k - 25k depends on what you get in the bowl. Rougly one person will spend around 15k - 25k per portion including drink.

The lady or the husband who is serving is not really that friendly, but I guess that's their thing.

Anyway, this place always packed and always out of food by the end of the day.
review 5: One of the popular Bakso Warung in Denpasar. Jumbo sized meatballs at reasonable prices. üëçüëçüëçüëçüòã

name: Pondok Cintya
address: Jl. Batu Bidak No.29A, Kerobokan Kaja, Kerobokan, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
William is very attentive to his customers, he responds very quickly to our needs or questions.

We were able to enjoy the pool with the children, the kitchen/bathroom is very spacious, and we brought the chairs from the balcony so that the little ones could eat in the kitchen.

The staff is a bit cold but that's probably due to the language barrier, our room was cleaned countless times even though it was supposed to be 1x per week which is also very nice.

Far from the beaches, but very close to a supermarket and many warungs. There's also a kid's playground 5min walk away, and we had fun at the Denpasar mall.

Very good experience, hoping the pool will be functional again.
review 2: Location is 20min far from the beach and not a comfy area. The service ist very nice and helpful but there are still some points which are very disappointing. Light is very cold and it doesn‚Äôt give you enough atmosphere. No desk lamp. Bed and room could be cleaned every three days. They don‚Äôt provide shampoo or cooking utensils. Pool is nice
review 3:
The place is quiet and clean with a small swimming pool in the middle. Pretty spacious room with spacious bathroom in separate door inside. The lighting inside the room could be improved. The wall and furniture look old and refurbished.
Better for longer stay since they don't provide shampoos and amenities.
No cooking appliances.
Provide towels and clean linens.
The wifi is very slow and sometimes disappears.
Not too close from beaches or hip restaurant s. Must be able to arrange your own travel while staying there.
Enough comfortable stay if you don't need luxuries.
review 4: Lovely quiet location but close to all amenities large pool and nice tended gardens. Rooms are large and well maintained with large storage room, wardrobe, and bathroom to the rear. I think a lot of the negative coments are a case of "champagne tastes on lemonade money" for what the rooms cost this is a fantastic place to stay.
review 5: I would definitely not recommend staying at Pondok Cintya. The outside area and the pool are nice, but that's it. The room itself needs to be renovated. There is mold on the walls, the furniture is old and partly broken and most of all, the place is just not clean at all (even though a 'cleaning service' is provided).

name: AYAM TEMPONG IBU SRI GN. SANGHYANG
address: Jl. Gunung Sanghyang No.252, Kerobokan Kaja, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80112, Indonesia
review 1: It‚Äôs budgeting restaurant for local people. They have interesting attract by provide some vegetables and sambal for free even the rice also big portion. Be carefull for those of  you who don‚Äôt like spicy, the sambal will make you sweat profusely. To drink i ordered jeruk hangat ( hot orange) and it dissapointed me a bit because it was made from instant sachet drink.
review 2:
Another tempong place in town. Spacious place. Price is very reasonable. Sambal is very spicy.

You can add more rice for free!!! And also free sambal and vegetables. Good deal!!

Staff is OK and helpful. Somehow clean.

Nice place. Will go there again.
review 3:
Free Charge, adding rice
Free Chilly
Food so recommended
review 5: Very to late until 30 minuet im waiting for ready my food

review 1: So tasty tender and crispy and very cheap for the fried chicken
review 2:
Today i order Ayam Fire B and the description on Grab is included with drink and rice. But i just got only the chicken without drink and rice. I called this ACK and ask about the menu on grab. I spoke with pak Arta and he followup this concern to main ACK. He get me back about the responses politely and clearly. This mistake purely from Grab who not updated about the description.

Thankyou for Pak Arta who handle and tell me clearly. And please kindly to check every menu on grab to avoid this mistake again and broke customer expectation. Best for ACK Muding especially for pak Artaüôèüôè
review 3: Food is good but at late hours you'll have to wait for them to resupply, usually you wait for 2 or 5 minutes.
review 4: Close by our home village for fried chicken and spagethi

address: Gg. V No.9, Kerobokan Kaja, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Be careful don‚Äôt ever transfer money first before check to location. Many scammer using google business account they put fake number to scam peoples.

name: Bakmi CC Jakarta - Kerobokan
address: Jl. Raya Kerobokan No.66, Kerobokan Kaja, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Bakmi CC Jakarta (from Bali)!
Rasanya dan Pedesnya banget! Totally recommended! Great quality food with great taste!
If you like spicy, ask for the pickle chillies - so bloody good!
If you do not like spicy, take  caution with the chilli!
Requested Extra pangsit #wonton
Requested Extra telur puyuh #quaileggs

#yummy
#takeaway #bakmiccjakarta #bakmidikerobokan #foodinbadung #foodinbali
review 2: Very delicious noodles, not useless I come far away from my living home to eat here as well... And also the owner and the staff was very2 friendly.. Nice... üíôüíôüíôüíôüíôüíô
review 3: Very tasty and cheap! A great place to eat local cuisine and meet the lovely hosts) I recommend it!
review 4: This place has good rating on google, we tried there and now this is the one of our fav place to eat. The menu is nice, the taste is delicious, the price is effordable üëç
review 5: I was warmly welcomed by the friendly owner and the staff and got myself Bakmie Ayam with Ice cappuccino to fill me up from the midday hot and sunny weather. What can I say, Bakmie ayam was good a usual and what's more good was the conversation I had with the owner whilst having my meal made my presence even more appreciable.  Good food and friendly people.üëç

name: Mama Rada
address: Jl. Raya Canggu, Kerobokan Kaja, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
It‚Äôs not a restaurant they are more like dark kitchen concept where you can order the food to be delivered or take away. The food itself is amazing. Everything I ordered there was delicious and high quality. WA manager answered promptly and I got my order delivered to canggu within 300 min.
Highly recommended
review 2: The restaurant is the most unclear, waiting for a long time for me to arrive, it hasn't been made yet, and the restaurant is still closed, the application is already openüò°üò°üò°
review 5:
I ordered them via Gojek and was pleasantly surprised by both the service and the quality of the food ‚Äì it‚Äôs simply splendid üòç The chicken dumplings are the best I've ever had.

I was also delighted to find that they included more dumplings than promised, along with some lovely little gifts ü•∞ My heart is melting.

Moreover, the packaging was very well done. A lot of attention to little design details.

Keep up the great work, guys ‚Äì you‚Äôre amazingü©µ

name: Mundeh Lodge
address: Jl. Muding Sari No.22, Kerobokan Kaja, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: I love this place. The atmosphere is soooo relaxing.

name: Warung Linci Ayam Goreng Kremes Khas Suroboyo
address: Jl. Gunung Sanghyang No.7, Kerobokan Kaja, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
My favorite midnight diner around Kerobokan area! Warung Linci! Fried chicken + rice with a cheap price. This restaurant is on the side of Gunung Sanghyang road, near the traffic light.

This restaurant usually busy at night until early morning (which around 2-4am). And this restaurant is open for 24/7.

Their menus are cheap. One of their package, the small chicken package is Rp9k: chicken+veggies+tempeh+rice. My fave.

Warung Linci is available on Grab Food. They only receive cash payment.
review 2: Great solution for latenite food in Kerobokan Badung. Overall, they have a good food in terms of taste and price
review 3: Great place to get cheap food in Denpasar.
review 4: Actually the food is nice, but the service is really terrible. They got emotional easily, I bought 2 chickens and waited for about more than 30 min. Then the other person arrived but got her food first. I complained without yelling or cursing, I just asked why my food didn't come  but the staff yelled at me. It was very bad service, I got mad and went home
review 5: affordable price with good staff and clean place, the food is tasty compared with price, sometimes there become crowded specialy when lunch or dinner time. the parking is at roadside. you can order for dine in or take away.

name: Es Teh Indonesia - Kerobokan
address: Jl. Gunung Sanghyang No.225x, Padangsambian Kaja, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 3: Nice place many variant of drinks

name: Depot Mun-Mun
address: Jl. Gunung Sanghyang No.238, Kerobokan Kaja, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80117, Indonesia
review 1: well known chinese food @gunung sanghyang. clean place, average taste but also affordable price.
review 2: An absolute gem for Asian food lovers! The flavors in every dish are incredibly bursting with deliciousness.
review 3:
I came here around 8 pm, under the rain after I met a doctor to check my health issues. I imagined I'd get nice experience but NOPE.

It's my 1st time I got bad experience in chinese food restaurant (I've never had bad experiences in chinese food place). I was the last customer they had today (25th Oct) & before me there were a family. I ordered 2 meals: sapo tahu seafood & bihun goreng seafood. I just finished half of my meals when they suddenly closed half of the rolling door and turn offhalf of the lamps. I bet if they could leave me there, they would do it without hesitation. I decided not finished my sapo tahu (I finished my bihun in a rush) after I swear I heard the man (owner) said "lama" (means 'slow') in unpleasant tone.

The food taste ok tho and I swear I was thinking to come back but after what I got, NOPE! Big NO NO for me. I would NEVER coming back there. Maybe the place is not for me.

If you want to go there, I recommend you to come before 8 pm even though it says they close at 10 pm.
review 4: Yummy Yummy Indo Chinese Food. Very reasonably priced. The Tuna Rica Rica is to die for. Also try the Sapo Tahu and the Nasi Goreng~~
review 5: Good food, decent price. I sometimes eat there, Nasi Capcay is my favourite.

name: Warung Makan Family
address: Jl. Gunung Sanghyang No.252, Kerobokan Kaja, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80112, Indonesia
review 1: Stop by after my first landing, found that this place busier than others around. The capcay helped me out from my jet lag! A bit hot inside and no fresh air. My hair smells like union once i came back home üôÉ i love how they care to their cust needs by provide toilet.
review 2:
nice place with tasty foodüòãü•∞

if i near this place, i always come here to eat
review 3: The food is really tasty, definitely becoming a regular here
review 4: Very nice food and fast cooking! We ordered Nasi Goreng, Sapo Tahu, Brocoli Jamur and we all loved it. They are also flexible to vegetarian if you tell your wishes. We will definitely come back.
review 5:
The food tastes really good. Cooks and served faster because it's just two of us, customers. The ambiance is too hot and the fan is useless because it just releases hot air. After all, there is no proper ventilation so we go out in very smelly clothes.

The price is acceptable and very reasonable. Budget-friendly!

The vegetarian option is available you just need to write down your wishes.

Overall, the food tastes superbly good, and will definitely come back again once they serve consistently. ü´∞üèΩ

review 1: If talk about taste, so everyyhing is average
